title: Firefox mobile password manager show many data breaches, desktop shows none, monitor shows 6
content:
I am using Firefox password manager. I've recently noticed that my mobile version is showing almost 80 passwords leaks. My Desktop version is showing 0 breaches (the alerts option is not showing at all). And my Firefox monitor is showing 8 leaks.

I need help to understand what is going on.
creator: guy31

title: Tab open and closes immediately when opening mailto links using Gmail as default app
content:
Hi there,

I am using gmail as my default email client, so that when I click on a mailto link from anywhere, the system (macos Monterey 12.5.1) passes the link to my default browser (Firefox 108.0.1). This used to work just fine until today: now the tab opens as usual, load gmail, I can glimpse at an email with the correct recipient but the tab closes straight away, without giving me any opportunity to interact. I found a very similar post from half a year ago: Clicking on a "mailto" link opens a new tab then automatically closes immediately, but as far as I understand the solution was to restart the computer (which I tried...). I could not find any other lead... Any idea?

With thanks and best regards
creator: cambray.guillaume

title: Problems with Yahoo email
content: Unable to use "Select All" in Yahoo email. Unable to select single email to delete without opening. Unable to delete email once opened. Unable to use any buttons above the email to move it anywhere. Unable to delete Spam and Trash folders. Can see emails and get into them but cannot do anything with them once open. Cannot send emails or attach files to them prior to attempting to send.
creator: karynfoley

title: Video issuses with current browser release
content: Browser with sound was working fine. Updated to current version, now I no longer have any video sound or live feed sound from any site.
creator: w.trevor.bailey
